caseTitle: Zulfiqar Ali Bhatti v. Election Commission of Pakistan & others
authorJudge: Mr. Justice Syed Mansoor Ali Shah
tagline: Scope of the general powers of the Election Commission under Article 218(3) of the Constitution and Section 8(c) of the Elections Act 2017 as well scope of its powers to order repoll under Sections 88 and 9 of the Elections Act 2017, explained.
